metadata.title: CVE-2022-41426 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Bento4 v1.6.0-639 was discovered to contain a memory leak via the AP4_AtomFactory::CreateAtomFromStream function in mp4split.

notes.note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
